title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository with CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama, published on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) for chaining Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (renamed to ‘Open WebUI’).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI client for Ollama with syntax highlighting and chat sessions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama (published on Maven Central).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama with async support.

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware to proxy and cache Ollama REST endpoints.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for semantic search & QA pipelines.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app with REST endpoints and admin UI for managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama (NuGet package).

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial Go client library for Ollama with context and chat helpers.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface that connects to local Ollama instances.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes and answer questions using Ollama.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node to integrate Ollama models into workflows.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve integration for scaling Ollama models across GPU clusters.
